name: ARImageTrackingConfiguration
desc: A configuration that tracks known images using the rear-facing camera.

items.name: var trackingImages: Set<ARReferenceImage>
items.desc: A set of images that ARKit searches for and tracks in the user's environment.

items.name: var maximumNumberOfTrackedImages: Int
items.desc: The number of image anchors to monitor closely for position and orientation updates.

items.name: var isAutoFocusEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the device camera uses fixed focus or autofocus behavior.
